system.description:
In a fight, good gear and knowing how to use it can mean the difference between victory and defeat, and you are well-versed in ensuring victory. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain an additional maneuver of a level you could learn from the combat tradition you selected as part of Combat Gadgeteer.
  • You can make a check to repair broken or damaged gear in 10 minutes, rather than as part of a short or long rest.
  • Half your fighter levels count as artificer levels for the purpose of the Advanced Tactical Chemistry feature.
  • When you are building spell inventions or researching rare spells of the Weaponry school, the gp costs are halved.
  • Half your artificer levels count as fighter levels for the purpose of the Indomitable feature.
  • When you would gain a new Soldiering Knack or Field Discovery, you can choose freely from either list.
